name: Discharge Disposition
description: Patient discharge disposition and transfer destination

values.description: Discharged to home or self care (routine discharge)
values.definition: Patient discharged to home or self care with routine discharge instructions

values.description: Discharged/transferred to another short term general hospital for inpatient care
values.definition: Patient transferred to another acute care hospital for continued inpatient treatment
Patient transferred to skilled nursing facility for extended care

values.description: Discharged/transferred to an intermediate care facility (ICF)
values.definition: Patient transferred to intermediate care facility

values.description: Discharged/transferred to another type of institution for inpatient care or referred for outpatient services to another institution
values.definition: Patient transferred to other institution for continued care

values.description: Discharged/transferred to home under care of organized home health service organization
values.definition: Patient discharged home with formal home health services

values.description: Left against medical advice or discontinued care
values.definition: Patient left facility against medical advice or discontinued treatment

values.description: Discharged/transferred to home under care of Home IV provider
values.definition: Patient discharged home with home intravenous therapy services

values.description: Admitted as an inpatient to this hospital
values.definition: Patient admitted as inpatient to the same facility
